messageBody:
HAI ,
I first thank u for responding to my query.
The thing I want to accomplish is run my test code and store the results. The storage of results must be part of junit code that should contain number of tests run,their names, success and failures. To put in a nutshell, I need to store the output of the junit code that we obtain after running it.

This is my requirement.i think this must make the situation pretty clear.
Thank You & Regards
Suresh.S
